001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.paper;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Numbers;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Raycast;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.raycast.PaperRaycast;
007import org.bukkit.Material;
008import org.bukkit.block.data.BlockData;
009import org.bukkit.entity.Entity;
010import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
011import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.ConfigSerializable;
012
013import java.util.Collections;
014import java.util.HashMap;
015import java.util.Map;
016
017public final class Penetration {
018    private static final double EPSILON = 0.01;
019
020    @ConfigSerializable
021    public record Config(
022        Map<BlockData, Double> density,
023        Map<BlockData, Double> hardness
024    ) {
025        public static final Config DEFAULT = new Config(Collections.emptyMap(), Collections.emptyMap());
026    }
027
028    private final CalibrePlugin plugin;
029    private Config config;
030    private final Map<Material, Map<BlockData, Double>> density = new HashMap<>();
031    private final Map<Material, Map<BlockData, Double>> hardness = new HashMap<>();
032
033    Penetration(CalibrePlugin plugin) {
034        this.plugin = plugin;
035    }
036
037    public Config config() { return config; }
038
039    public void load() {
040        config = plugin.setting(Config.DEFAULT, (n, d) -> n.get(Config.class, d), "penetration");
041        density.clear();
042        config.density.forEach((data, val) -> density
043            .computeIfAbsent(data.getMaterial(), k -> new HashMap<>())
044            .put(data, val));
045        hardness.clear();
046        config.hardness.forEach((data, val) -> hardness
047            .computeIfAbsent(data.getMaterial(), k -> new HashMap<>())
048            .put(data, val));
049    }
050
051    public double hardness(BlockData block) {
052        Material mat = block.getMaterial();
053        var matHardness = hardness.get(mat);
054        if (matHardness != null) {
055            for (var entry : matHardness.entrySet()) {
056                if (block.matches(entry.getKey())) {
057                    return entry.getValue();
058                }
059            }
060        }
061        return mat.getBlastResistance();
062    }
063
064    public double hardness(PaperRaycast raycast, Vector3 from, Vector3 to, double distance, @Nullable Entity target) {
065        double hardness = 0;
066
067        Vector3 pos = from;
068        Vector3 dir = to.subtract(from).normalize();
069        Vector3 epsilon = dir.multiply(EPSILON);
070        Raycast.Result<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> res;
071        while ((res = raycast.cast(pos, dir, distance, null)).hit() != null) {
072            var hit = res.hit().hit();
073            if (hit.entity() == target)
074                break;
075            if (hit.entity() != null) {
076                hardness += 0; // TODO hardness calc for entities
077            }
078            if (hit.block() != null) {
079                hardness += hardness(hit.block().getBlockData()) * res.hit().penetration();
080            }
081            pos = res.hit().out().add(epsilon);
082            distance -= res.distance() + EPSILON;
083        }
084
085        return hardness;
086    }
087
088    public double hardness(PaperRaycast raycast, Vector3 from, Vector3 to, @Nullable Entity target) {
089        return hardness(raycast, from, to, from.distance(to), target);
090    }
091
092    public double penetration(double hardness, double penetration) {
093        return penetration <= 0
094            ? hardness > 0 ? 0 : 1
095            : 1 - Numbers.clamp01(hardness / penetration);
096    }
097}
